attributes.action: Lobby the IOC to prevent Russian paralympians from competing in Beijing.
attributes.background: The UK government should put pressure on the international Olympic committee to prevent Paralympians from the Russian Olympic Committee competing in the winter Olympics in Beijing. If the IOC refuse, all other nations should withdraw immediately.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about participation in the Olympics are a matter for the International Olympics Committee, not the UK Government or Parliament.
